commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<template>
	<cl-crud :ref="setRefs('crud')" @load="onLoad">
		<el-row type="flex" align="middle">
			<!-- 刷新按钮 -->
			<cl-refresh-btn />
			<!-- 新增按钮 -->
			<cl-add-btn />
			<!-- 删除按钮 -->
			<cl-multi-delete-btn />
			<cl-flex1 />
			<!-- 关键字搜索 -->
			<cl-search-key />
		</el-row>

		<el-row>
			<!-- 数据表格 -->
			<cl-table :ref="setRefs('table')" v-bind="table" />
		</el-row>

		<el-row type="flex">
			<cl-flex1 />
			<!-- 分页控件 -->
			<cl-pagination />
		</el-row>

		<!-- 新增、编辑 -->
		<cl-upsert :ref="setRefs('upsert')" v-bind="upsert" />
	</cl-crud>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent, inject, reactive } from "vue"
import { CrudLoad, Upsert, Table } from "cl-admin-crud-vue3/types"
import { useRefs } from "/@/core"

export default defineComponent({
	setup() {
		const { refs, setRefs } = useRefs()
		// 请求服务
		const service = inject<any>("service")

		// 新增、编辑配置
		const upsert = reactive<Upsert>({
			items: [
				{
					label: "名称",
					prop: "name",
					component: {
						name: "el-input"
					}
				},
				{
					label: "创建时间",
					prop: "createTime",
					component: {
						name: "el-input"
					}
				}
			]
		})

		// 表格配置
		const table = reactive<Table>({
			columns: [
				{
					label: "名称",
					prop: "name"
				},
				{
					label: "创建时间",
					prop: "createTime"
				}
			]
		})

		// crud 加载
		function onLoad({ ctx, app }: CrudLoad) {
			// 绑定 service
			ctx.service(service.client.cliTemplate).done()
			app.refresh()
		}

		return {
			refs,
			setRefs,
			upsert,
			table,
			onLoad
		}
	}
})
</script>
